Perform varimax rotation on a low rank matrix factorization

Source: R/vsp.R
vsp.svd_like.Rd

Perform varimax rotation on a low rank matrix factorization

# S3 method for svd_like
vsp(
  x,
  rank,
  ...,
  centerer = NULL,
  scaler = NULL,
  recenter = FALSE,
  rescale = TRUE,
  rownames = NULL,
  colnames = NULL
)

Examples


library(fastadi)

mf <- adaptive_impute(ml100k, rank = 20, max_iter = 5)

#> INFO [2020-11-21 00:42:34] Using svd initialization.

fa <- vsp(mf)
